name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior AWS Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **AWS**, **Terraform**, and **CDK** for automated infrastructure management. Proficient in designing and deploying cloud-native systems with a focus on **Infrastructure-as-Code** and **CI/CD** pipelines to enhance efficiency and scalability.
Experienced in leveraging **SAP HANA** and **S/4HANA** technologies, with a strong background in compliance and governance frameworks, ensuring alignment with industry standards. Skilled in optimizing **FinOps** strategies for cost management and utilizing **Monitoring** and **Automation** tools for streamlined operations.
Expert in full stack development with hands-on experience in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, utilizing frameworks like **React**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. A proven record in building innovative AI/ML platforms that drive predictive analytics and real-time processing.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented **AWS** best practices for deploying scalable applications using **Terraform** and **CDK**, ensuring high availability (HA) and disaster recovery (DR) solutions.
Designed and built infrastructure-as-code (IaC) strategies to automate resource provisioning with **CI/CD** pipelines, achieving 90% faster deployment times compared to manual processes.
Managed **IAM** roles and permissions to secure cloud resources, adhering to compliance standards while facilitating seamless integration with existing systems like **SAP HANA** and **S/4HANA**.
Optimized storage solutions within **AWS**, leveraging services like **S3**, **EBS**, and **RDS** to support data-intensive applications with 99.9% uptime.
Executed cloud networking strategies involving **AWS VPC**, ensuring secure connections and efficient routing between environments, leading to improved application performance by 30%.
Enhanced monitoring and logging frameworks by integrating **AWS CloudWatch** and **CloudTrail** for real-time analytics, resulting in a 40% reduction in incident response time.
Collaborated within cross-functional teams, promoting effective communication and teamwork while serving as a key contact for **FinOps** initiatives focused on cost optimization.
Designed comprehensive landing zones aligned with best practices ensuring security, compliance, and scalability for all solutions deployed on **AWS**.
Developed automated scripts for infrastructure management and monitoring, reducing operational overhead by 20% and increasing reliability across environments.
Led initiatives to integrate **SAP-MAP** for seamless data transfers between AWS and on-premise solutions, improving data access efficiency for end-users by 25%.

Utilized **AWS** services for deploying and managing cloud infrastructure, ensuring high availability (**HA**) and disaster recovery (**DR**) for financial applications.
Implemented Infrastructure-as-Code practices using **Terraform** and **CDK** to automate cloud resource provisioning, improving deployment speed by **30%**.
Configured and maintained **IAM** policies to enhance security posture and compliance across cloud services, enabling controlled access to sensitive data.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate **SAP HANA** and **S/4HANA** solutions into existing cloud architecture, optimizing data storage and processing for financial applications.
Designed and implemented **Landing Zones** to streamline secure multi-account AWS environments, contributing to a **40%** improvement in governance and compliance.
Automated monitoring and alerting solutions using **FinOps** practices, ensuring operational costs are optimized and aligning spending with business objectives.
Fostered **teamwork** and effective **communication** across teams to ensure seamless collaboration on cloud infrastructure projects, emphasizing **customer orientation** in service delivery.
Developed and documented CI/CD pipelines for application deployment using **AWS CodePipeline** and **GitHub Actions**, enhancing deployment frequency and reliability by **25%**.

- Designed and optimized cloud infrastructures using **AWS** services, applying Infrastructure-as-Code principles with **Terraform** and AWS **CDK** to ensure high availability (HA) and disaster recovery (DR) configurations.
- Implemented monitoring solutions through AWS CloudWatch, ensuring real-time performance tracking and automation of alerts for infrastructure health.
- Engaged in FinOps practices to manage cloud expenditure and optimize resource allocation for cost-effectiveness while enhancing operational efficiency by **20%**.
- Established secure IAM policies to manage user access effectively, supporting role-based access control (RBAC) and adhering to GDPR compliance for sensitive data protection.
- Developed provisioning strategies for **SAP HANA** and **S/4HANA** environments, creating landing zones for seamless deployment and integration.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement CI/CD pipelines for automated deployments, improving release cycles by **30%** and minimizing deployment risk through blue-green deployment strategies.
- Enhanced network security by applying well-defined networking standards within AWS, improving infrastructure reliability and access control mechanisms.
- Engaged in ongoing communication with stakeholders to ensure project alignment with business objectives and customer orientation, enhancing user satisfaction by **25%**.
- Contributed to team success through effective teamwork, sharing best practices for automation, and maintaining high standards of technical excellence in all operations.
